main event: Several observers reported a loud explosion and bright flash in Riv de l'Ouestricll on September 15, 1952, initially thought to be a meteorite.
interesting points: Reports indicated that the explosion shook several buildings,Witnesses saw a bright flash before hearing the explosion,The opinion among observers was that the explosion was caused by a meteorite, The object was described as shiny and brighter than the surrounding sky, There were issues with the photographic evidence, leading to questions about the authenticity of the image.
location: Riv de l'Ouestricll, Unknown Region, Unknown Country
